title: Function Complexity Metrics
description: Raw complexity metrics for a function

cc.description: Cyclomatic Complexity - number of linearly independent paths through the code (decision points + 1)

nd.description: Nesting Depth - maximum level of nested control structures (if/while/for/try)

fo.description: Fan-Out - number of distinct functions or methods called by this function

ns.description: Non-Structured exits - number of early returns, throws, breaks, and continues
